summary: Successfully captured Admin Dashboard preview for Paridhaan Creations e-commerce platform. All 8 admin tabs are functional and accessible with proper authentication.

issues: The Perfumes category shows an 'AMMUNITION' bottle image which may not be appropriate for a perfume category - consider using a more relevant perfume image

features: Low Stock Alert section with product warnings
Products table with Image, Name, Category, Price, Stock columns
9 products displayed including: Brass Decorative Diya Set, Wooden Carved Elephant, Silver Plated Pooja Thali, Incense Stick Holder Set, Royal Oud Perfume, Floral Attar Collection, Kundan Necklace Set
4 categories displayed: Handicrafts, Pooja Articles, Perfumes, Jewellery
Category cards with images and descriptions
Orders table with Order ID, Date, Total, Payment, Status columns
Status dropdown to update order status (Pending, Confirmed, Shipped, Delivered, Cancelled)
2 banners displayed: Festival Special Collection, Premium Jewellery Collection
Banner cards with images and links
Coupons Management section (currently empty - no coupons created)
SMS Notifications (Twilio) with Order Confirmed, Shipped, Delivered options - all Enabled
Email Notifications section with Order Confirmation, Shipping Updates - Ready to Configure
Low Stock Alerts with threshold set to 5 units
Export & Reports section with Product Export and Order Export buttons

success_rate.frontend: 100% - All admin dashboard tabs working correctly

seed_data_creation: Created admin user with is_admin=true and session token for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin dashboard fully functional. Test credentials created in MongoDB. All 8 tabs (Analytics, Insights, Products, Categories, Orders, Banners, Coupons, Settings) are working. The admin route /admin is protected and requires authentication with is_admin=true.
